title: Installation
para: This chapter is a general installation guide for Destar.

sect1.title: Prerequisites
sect1.para: List of needed sofware to run DeStar and recommended additional stuff to extend DeStar features.

sect2.title: Python
sect2.para: Get and install Python. We use Python 2.4 for development, but maybe Python 2.3 would suffice.

sect2.title: Quixote
sect2.para: For Python 2.3 (see ) you can install Quixote version 1.0 or 1.2. For Python 2.4 (see ) you should only install Quixote 1.2.
If you can't find it in your Linux distribution, then download the source from the official project page.
